BUY TICKETS

Orlando & I-Drive Corporate Event Venue //__title Plan An Event (407) 426-7555 //__button //__content //container A Corporate Party Venue Like No Other An Experience That Will Stay Frozen In The Memories Of Your Guests An Expedition Into The Arctic Enjoy Your Journey While Sipping Cocktails From Our Ice Glasses Professional Catering Options A Variety of Delicious Appetizers, Meals & Desserts Available //Slider The Ultimate Corporate Event Experience Show your employees how much you appreciate them with an amazing experience at the coolest corporate event venue on I-Drive in Orlando! Located on International Drive just a few minutes from the Orange County Convention Center, ICEBAR boasts 5,100 sqft of flexible event space with premium amenities, features, and customizations to take your event to the next level! We specialize in all corporate parties and occasions including: Holiday parties Company outings Employee appreciation Networking events Host Your Company Party at ICEBAR We offer a variety of Orlando corporate event spaces and packages to accommodate all headcounts and requirements. ICEBAR provides in-house catering and offers multiple outdoor expansion options for maximum flexibility. We also offer flexible buyout options for corporate parties including indoor space for 465 people, a patio that entertains up to 90 guests, and an outdoor expansion that extends capacity to 1,200. Contact our events team to book a business event at one of the best nightclubs and nightlife on I-Drive in Orlando ! Looking for romantic and fun Orlando date night ideas , fun Orlando bachelorette party ideas or fun Orlando birthday party ideas ? Ask about our all-inclusive party packages including discounted entry fees, food and alcohol specials, and free upgrades. Whether hitting I-Drive with the whole crew or treating your partner to a one-on-one night together, ICEBAR never disappoints. Located in the heart of Central Florida, we’re right next to all the action. Get tickets to one of the best bars on I-Drive in Orlando . Quick Specs Reception capacity: Up to 1000 guests Fire Lounge: Up to 465 guests ICEBAR: Up to 50 guests Polar Patio: Up to 90 guests Al Fresco Patio: Up to 1000 guests Seated Capacity: Up to 100 guests Venue Space: 5,100 ft² Request Information Request Brochure & Info Request Brochure & Info Sales: (407) 426-7555 Contact Hailey Sales@ICEBAROrlando.com Quick Specs Reception capacity: Up to 1000 guests Fire Lounge: Up to 465 guests ICEBAR: Up to 50 guests Polar Patio: Up to 90 guests Al Fresco Patio: Up to 1000 guests Seated Capacity: Up to 100 guests Venue Space: 5,100 ft² ICEBAR Floorplan View 360 Download FLoorplan Past Clients The Ultimate Corporate Event Experience Show your employees how much you appreciate them with an amazing experience at the coolest corporate event venue on I-Drive in Orlando! Located on International Drive just a few minutes from the Orange County Convention Center, ICEBAR boasts 5,100 sqft of flexible event space with premium amenities, features, and customizations to take your event to the next level! We specialize in all corporate parties and occasions including: Holiday parties Company outings Employee appreciation Networking events Host Your Company Party at ICEBAR We offer a variety of Orlando corporate event spaces and packages to accommodate all headcounts and requirements. ICEBAR provides in-house catering and offers multiple outdoor expansion options for maximum flexibility. We also offer flexible buyout options for corporate parties including indoor space for 465 people, a patio that entertains up to 90 guests, and an outdoor expansion that extends capacity to 1,200. Contact our events team to book a business event at one of the best nightclubs and nightlife on I-Drive in Orlando ! Looking for romantic and fun Orlando date night ideas , fun Orlando bachelorette party ideas or fun Orlando birthday party ideas ? Ask about our all-inclusive party packages including discounted entry fees, food and alcohol specials, and free upgrades. Whether hitting I-Drive with the whole crew or treating your partner to a one-on-one night together, ICEBAR never disappoints. Located in the heart of Central Florida, we’re right next to all the action. Get tickets to one of the best bars on I-Drive in Orlando . Experience Corporate Events at ICEBAR Past Clients Venue Features Venue Capacity Details & Flexible Buyout Options Reception capacity: Up to 1000 guests Fire Lounge: Up to 465 guests ICEBAR: Up to 50 guests Polar Patio: Up to 90 guests Al Fresco Patio: Up to 1000 guests Seated Capacity: Up to 100 guests Venue Space: 5,100 ft² Catering / Beverages Flexible, In-House Catering & Full Bar Options. Unique Cocktail Experiences like a Bourbon Tasting Bar, Jet Chill Cocktails, Mixology Martinis and more! A / V & Branding Options Presentation-Ready Sound System Customizable LED Lighting Full Media Wall 8 Screens for Optimal Branding GOBO Logo Projections Unique Venue Features ICEBAR Made with over 70 tons of hand-carved ice Fire Lounge with full dance-floor Branded Digital Photography Parking There is a large and free parking lot behind the ICEBAR Orlando building for ICEBAR Orlando patrons. In addition, the Pointe Orlando parking garage is very nearby. Event Enhancements & Add-Ons Branding Catering Cigar Rollers DJ Entertainment Custom Cocktail Experiences Custom Ice Sculpture Flair Bartenders Unique Themed Events VIDEO BG TESTIMONIALS /col /row “Icebar Orlando executes corporate events flawlessly. Our customers were thrilled with the venue, staff, food, music… the entire night. Staff is professional and courteous and helped our team facilitate a relaxing yet dynamic atmosphere – exactly what we needed and wanted.” MICHAEL MAYO CATERPILLAR. INC. “We held our company holiday party at the icebar and it was amazing! the staff went above and beyond to make sure everyone enjoyed themselves and our employees raved about what a great time they had! thanks icebar for a fabulous time!” LISA CORNELIUS PENTAHO “We held our company holiday party at the icebar and it was amazing! the staff went above and beyond to make sure everyone enjoyed themselves and our employees raved about what a great time they had! thanks icebar for a fabulous time!” LISA CORNELIUS PENTAHO /container Follow Us On Place
